page.title: 17Current Interests.
page.content: We interviewed people on the street to ask them which items of news were uppermost in their minds during the month of June, 1985. These are our findings: {World News} American hostages held during hi- jack of aeroplane in the Middle East. The famine in Ethiopia. {National News.} Wimbledon tennis fortnight. By-election win for the SDP/Liberal alliance. Teachers' action causing disruption in some schools. {Local News.} Andover show. Teachers' action hitting local schools. Concern about vandalism.
